rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming area with modern Scandinavian design, minimalistic interiors, natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with clean lines and integrated home theatre system; open floor plan.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Modern dining space with elegant Scandinavian design elements and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Home Theatre
rooms.description: Well-equipped home theatre area integrated within the living room space; acoustic design considerations.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Outdoor area with a luxurious swimming pool; designed to complement Scandinavian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Service Areas
rooms.description: Includes kitchenette, laundry area, and storage spaces; minimalistic design.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large glass entrance door ensuring ample light and connectivity with the garden.

openings.name: Window Atrium
openings.description: Series of floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to promote natural light and Vastu alignment.

openings.name: Balcony Doorways
openings.description: Each bedroom features its own balcony door for private outdoor space and fresh air.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with ample natural light, integrated Scandinavian design and private balcony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a dedicated balcony and modern finishes, ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom with a private balcony and Scandinavian minimalist decor.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed guest bathroom complementing the bedroom spaces; Scandinavian design elements.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for additional storage and maintenance equipment.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Balconies connected to each bedroom ensuring ample outdoor space and privacy.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Modern staircase providing access between floors with Scandinavian design influences.

rooms.name: Additional Living Space / Study
rooms.description: Spacious multipurpose room designed for work or relaxation, adhering to Scandinavian simplicity.

rooms.name: Balcony / Terrace
rooms.description: Extended open balcony for relaxation and views; aligns with luxury and Scandinavian design.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Door leading from the multipurpose room to the terrace balcony.
